Direct Mapped Cache
============================================

## Description

A simple parametrized direct mapped cache.

## Parameters
- AW = 10,   // address width
- DW = 32,   // data width
- INDEXW = 6 // NUM_LINES = 1 << INDEXW

## Original Source

- [cache.v]](./rtl/cache.v)
